WorkItem.Description: Just had problem to retrieve more than 5k records the xml that says more records doesnt have property .text which indicates if the resultset contains more records or not, i could fix that with using .nodeValue instead .text

Comments.Message:
Hi There.

There was a bug in the previous release. Can you please try 2.1 and see if it works for you now?

Kind Regard,
Jaimie,

Hi Jop its fixed in the latest update, but now im having issue with retrieving large sets, now i got stucked on page3 req.send() will return Error 500. Do you have any idea what cause this ? this means that the largest set i can get now is 10k

Hi. 

There should be no limit in the function of how many you can retrieve. A possibility is that the large number of returned records will cause a time out.

If you need to retrieve more 5k records, it is better to think about another approach for better performance. 

Kind Regards,
Jaimie
